DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the prevalence of inflammatory dry eye disease in patients prior to cataract surgery. No treatment is administered in this study.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Determine the Prevalence of Inflammatory Dry Eye Disease in Patients Prior to Cataract Removal
DOC.criteria: Scheduled to undergo cataract removal surgery Current use of eye drops or oral medications for allergic conjunctivitis Serious ocular injury, intraocular surgery, or refractive surgery within 6 months in the study eye Use of a contact lens within 4 weeks
